item.title: Fitting Algorithm
item.description: Automatic application of typographical constraints for printing text documents on browsers Thesis project for my bachelor degree. Developing of a fitting algorithm which help choosing a paginated sequence with a system of scores, established by typesetting rules (ex. no widows or orphans, no flyspeck, no blank space), that will be then displayed on the browser using the open source framework Paged.js. Skills used Languages: Javascript, HTML5, CSS3 Concepts: Pagination, Digital Publishing, Typography Tools: Paged.
